channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Market Efficiency vs. Behavioral Finance: Which Strategy Delivers Better Returns?
item.description: Team Efficient Markets vs. Team Behavioral Finance: It's the academic equivalent of Lakers vs. Celtics.

item.title: Trump opposes Florida's Amendment 4, which offers unfettered abortion access: 'It's radical'
item.description: Donald Trump spoke out against Florida's Amendment 4, which would enshrine the right to abortion, exclusively with Fox News' Bryan Llenas on Friday.

item.title: Trump Should Get Right on Life
item.description: Coming out against a sweeping pro-abortion initiative in Florida, after causing confusion over his position, is a good first step.
